channel.title: Pest Control, Monster Problems?
channel.description:
I can't find any topics on pest control, oddly, so...
1. How can I make it so my autospawned portals don't attack you?
2. How can I make it so the PC monsters can walk around, but only outside the fence?
3. How can I make it so the PC monsters don't hit 28 at level 41 o.o' (I wanna change what each can hit individually)
4. If possible: How can I remove the pest control doors. If I can remove the doors, I won't need to know how to make them walk around ONLY outside the fence, but just everywhere in PC.
Thanks to any advice.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2009, 02:42:05 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: Pest Control, Monster Problems?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

I can’t find any topics on pest control, oddly, so…

  1. How can I make it so my autospawned portals don’t attack you?

  2. How can I make it so the PC monsters can walk around, but only outside the fence?

    (I wanna change what each can hit individually)

  4. If possible: How can I remove the pest control doors.
    If I can remove the doors, I won’t need to know how to make them walk around ONLY outside the fence, but just everywhere in PC.
